title: White full helm

properties.name: description
properties.value: The white full helm is a type of White Knight helmet that is members only. To wear a white full helm the player must have completed the Wanted! quest and have at least 10 Defence. One can either buy one for 1056 coins from Sir Vyvin (with the Adept ranking) or trade with another player. It has the same bonuses as a black full helmet except for the prayer bonus. As with all white armour, this cannot be made using the Smithing skill.

Item ID6623

The white full helm is a type of White Knight helmet that is members only. To wear a white full helm the player must have completed the Wanted! quest and have at least 10 Defence. One can either buy one for 1056 coins from Sir Vyvin (with the Adept ranking) or trade with another player. It has the same bonuses as a black full helmet except for the prayer bonus. As with all white armour, this cannot be made using the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+12+13+10-1+12

[[File:White full helm detail.png|left|120px]]
[[File:White full helm chathead.png|left]]
The '''white full helm''' is a type of [[White Knight equipment|White Knight]] [[helmet]] that is [[members only]]. To wear a white full helm the player must have completed the [[Wanted!]] [[quest]] and have at least 10 [[Defence]]. One can either buy one for 1056 coins from [[Sir Vyvin]] (with the Adept [[White Knight rank|ranking]]) or trade with another player. It has the same bonuses as a [[black full helmet]] except for the [[prayer bonus]]. As with all white armour, this cannot be made using the [[Smithing]] skill.
